name: Camini
description:
A package is delivered to you with a simple seed inside... 

You decide to take care of it.

Welcome to Camini! You will have to take care of Cana, a small seed that would like to grow. For this, it is enough to give her water, sun and fertilizer regularly. 

At night, take a break and watch Cana sleep, or listen to the listen to royalty-free music. Only on the day will Cana need you. Don't let her needs fall too low or she will fade!

After a few days, maybe Cana will surprise you while growing up...
